posts.postText:
# 92 "zHeadcrab" STEAM_0:1:27557398  1:13:00 85 0 active
Pushed me off the roof when innocent, i fell to my death.
Link to pic is here:

http://steamcommunity.com/id/hidden_assassin/screenshot/578927326865287089
http://steamcommunity.com/id/hidden_assassin/screenshot/578927326865283661

Asking for demotion as well as ban, this was blatant rdm.

i do have to say that it is his second day on the server i dont think demotion is in question do to the fact he hasnt abused his powers, but i did talk to him he didnt know that pushing consisted with rdm, frankly i thought that was just lack of common sense on his part, i told him about now that to treat everyone as if they dont have a sense of humor and not to t bait/ rdm.

i am not a mod but i feel 1day is allowed, do to his first offense and new to server all together.
A minor offense, would be probably be a slay. But if he left right after, then a 1day ban would be okay. Personally, I wouldn't even consider a demotion.
Why would you ask for a demotion when his VIP has nothing to do with the offense?
Ask for demotion when people break rules. Shows that they are capable of assuming they can go against em and do what they want.
Crisis, i think you need to ease up a bit.

might i add he didnt leave right after but a good map and a half of rounds before having to leave,rank had nothing to do with thinking he could break the rules when he didnt think he was breaking rules in the first place. i did talk to him about it though.

Deserves a slay at the most.

Locked.
